txt.en: 'I am pleased  that you could join us, [placeholder].\n\n'We are about to decide how we should proceed with our new-found Orc problem. Since you have encountered both of these Orc-tribes, I wanted you present for this conversation.'
The people of Aldburg have come together to decide how best to deal with the two Orc-tribes that have been causing trouble of late.\n\nYou should observe the discussion.
Arcil, Éothain, and others have gathered to discuss the next course of action for Aldburg.\n\nYou should speak with Arcil.
'I think that we have discussed this quite enough for one night, [placeholder].'
Both Arcil and Éothain stated their case about which Orc-tribe poses the greatest threat.\n\nYou speak with Arcil once again.
DNT - Observed the discussion about the next course of action for Aldburg
'I am afraid that nothing was settled. We each presented our cases, but both of these groups pose a potentially great threat. We need to see that they are both dealt with swiftly.'
A small assembly from Aldburg have gathered to discuss how to handle the Orc problems that have plagued the Eastfold of late.
